question.body:
You will be given a description of a boneâ€™s function. Select the name of the bone that is being described.
Supports facial structures, encloses and protects the brain.

response.feedback: Correct. The Cranium is in the axial skeletal grouping and is part of the skull.
Incorrect. The Mandible is in the axial skeletal grouping and is part of the skull.
Incorrect. The Vertebrae is in the axial skeletal grouping and is part of the Vertebral column.
Incorrect. The Ribs are in the axial skeletal grouping and located in the chest.
Incorrect. The Ribs are in the axial skeletal grouping and located in the thoracic cage.

part.hint: It is located in the head.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The Cranium is in the axial skeletal grouping and is part of the skull.
Correct. The Mandible is in the axial skeletal grouping and is part of the skull.

Incorrect. The Ribs are in the axial skeletal grouping and located in the chest.
Incorrect. The Ribs are in the axial skeletal grouping and located in the thoracic cage.

part.hint: It is located in the lower jaw.

body.p: Permit mechanical stability for the body and protect the spinal cord.

body.p: rovides attachment for many (not all) ribs.
